--------------- WELCOME ------------

 * Welcome to the README.txt File, read all informations for your get the afterwork in best conditions ;-)
 * Get one Big Cofee, listen your best playlist, and go read this file, thank you Francis !

--------------- 1. INFORMATIONS DIRECTORY ------------

 * All files (js, css, img) is in the folder /assets/
 * The PSD Files for Photoshop CS6 is in the folder /assets/img/restaurant/cartes/PSD/
 * The Branding for PRIMARIS is in the folder /assets/img/branding/

--------------- 1.1 SECURITY FILES DIRECTORY ------------

 * One page index.html (blank) is added for the all directory for this website.

--------------- 2. LIBRARY CREDITS ---------------------

 * This Website using Library Bootstrap :
 * Bootstrap v3.3.7 (http://getbootstrap.com)
 * Copyright 2011-2016 Twitter, Inc.
 * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/blob/master/LICENSE)

--------------- 3. CSS PROPRIETY ---------------------

 * These are fonts which are loaded in from the Google Web Fonts library. Customize this as needed to utilize different fonts */
 * Police : font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
 * Principal File CSS : app.css in /assets/css/app.css/
 * CSS Mobile Experience : /assets/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.css/
 * Fontawesome : fontawesome-webfont3e6e.eot in /assets/fonts/

--------------- 4. JQUERY CREDITS ---------------------

 * jQuery v1.10.2 | (c) 2005, 2013 jQuery Foundation, Inc. | jquery.org/license
 *  sourceMappingURL=jquery.min.map

 * Blue (Principal Color) : #00084b
 * Blue (Border Color) : #000d85
